name: Board of Quality Standards
goal: The BQS is is an international organization  and Think Tank working for increased humanitarian efforts in the field of education and certifications
interests: Consumers, Culture, Education and training, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: The BQS is following legislative files which are relevant for open education and quality promotion and certification.  It pays particular attention to the revisions of the regulation on official controls of the regulation on open education, life long learning, vocational education and quality certifications.
